name: European Cold Storage and Logistics Association
membership:
ECSLA is a member of UEAPME - the European Association for small and medium sized enterprises
www.ueapme.com
goal:
ECSLA represents the interests of the temperature controlled logistics companies at the level of European and international Institutions in order to contribute to the development of a legislative and economic framework addressing the competitiveness of industry, food quality and safety, consumer protection and respect for the environment.
In this regard ECSLA aims
• To represent the common interests of its Members at EU institutions (in particular the European Commission, the Council and the European Parliament).
• To give information on legislative and technical developments regarding the cold storage and temperature controlled logistics industry to the ECSLA Members.
• To be a platform for discussions for the European cold storage and temperature controlled logistic sector.
• To ensure the promotion and the defence of the cold storage and temperature controlled logistics industry in Europe.
• To assist Members in an evolving economical area, in keeping welfare and competitiveness.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: REFIT on the General Food Law, Official Controls Regulation & implementation, food safety and hygiene rules, traceability of foodstuff, food waste; Circular economy package, implementation of the F-Gas Regulation, energy efficiency, heating and cooling strategy, renewable energy, energy performance of buildings; transport & issues in particular logistics
